title: Opportunities to integrate Ecosystem Services into Life Cycle Assessment (LCA): a case study of milk production in Brazil
content:
Publication date: October 2024

Source: Ecosystem Services, Volume 69

Author(s): Daiane Vitória da Silva, Ana Laura Raymundo Pavan, Luiz Carlos de Faria, Cassiano Moro Piekarski, Yovana María Barrera Saavedra, Diogo A. Lopes Silva
